meanings.definition: In a luxurious manner; with luxury or extravagance.
meanings.sent1: She lived luxuriously in a grand mansion.
meanings.sent2: The wealthy couple traveled luxuriously in a private jet.
meanings.sent3: The cat stretched out luxuriously on the soft velvet sofa.
meanings.sent4: The sun set luxuriously over the horizon, painting the sky in vibrant colors.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of freshly baked cookies filled the room, making it feel luxuriously cozy.

meanings.sent1: The luxuriously decorated hotel room had a stunning view of the city.
meanings.sent2: She wore a luxuriously soft cashmere sweater on the chilly evening.
meanings.sent3: The garden was filled with luxuriously blooming flowers of all colors.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the luxuriously decorated ballroom.
meanings.sent5: The luxuriously appointed yacht sailed gracefully across the sparkling waters.
